alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Washington, Hyde, northeastern Beaufort and southwestern Tyrrell Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 515 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Leechville, or 25 miles southeast of Plymouth, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belhaven, Sladesville, Ponzer, Gull Rock, Swindell Fork, Scranton, Fairfield, New Holland, Nebraska, Leechville, Rose Bay, Lake Landing, Middletown, Lake Mattamuskeet, Pungo Lake, Alligator Lake and Swan Quarter Ferry Terminal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
